statements: DELETE FROM Resorts WHERE resort_name = 'Mountain Resort';
DELETE FROM Resorts WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%weekly%';
DELETE FROM Resorts WHERE resort_name LIKE '%Mountain%';
DELETE FROM Resorts WHERE location = 'Beach Resort';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE resort_id IN (SELECT resort_id FROM Resorts WHERE location = 'Mountain');
DELETE FROM Resorts WHERE resort_id IN (SELECT resort_id FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE resort_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND equipment_type = 'HVAC';
DELETE FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE resort_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE resort_id = 1 AND schedule_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE resort_id = (SELECT resort_id FROM Resorts WHERE resort_name = 'Mountain Valley Resort') OR quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM Operations WHERE resort_id = 2 AND status = 'inactive';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE resort_id = 1 AND schedule_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE resort_id = 2 AND quantity < 5;
